## Filters.HierarchicalFacetDisplay() function

A HierarchicalFacetDisplay takes a `DisplayableFacet` and renders the facet in a way to represent multiple levels of "hierarchies".

The hierarchies are determined by the provided delimiter, which defaults to "<!-- -->&gt;<!-- -->".

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function HierarchicalFacetDisplay({ facet, delimiter, showMoreLimit, customCssClasses, cssCompositionMethod }: HierarchicalFacetDisplayProps): JSX.Element;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  { facet, delimiter, showMoreLimit, customCssClasses, cssCompositionMethod } | HierarchicalFacetDisplayProps |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

JSX.Element
